name: Code Review Timeline Agent
shortDescription: Validates timeline files before coding begins.
fullDescription: This agent ensures that the required 'cronograma.md' file exists before any code is written. If the file is missing, it automatically fetches 'preplanejamento.md' and redirects the user to the appropriate timeline planning agent.
UseCases:
• Ensure necessary project planning files are present before development
• Automate validation and handoff processes in coding workflows
• Redirect users to the timeline requirements agent when needed
